definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to seize every minute (idiom)/to make the best use of one's time

sentences.english: Person's life is too short, not regret the day too, only sad moment.
sentences.chinese: 人之一生何其短，不悔朝夕易過，只悲分秒難熬。

sentences.english: After the rain is fine, Lotus overflowing, success and fame only in overnight.
sentences.chinese: 雨過是天晴，荷香四溢，成功與英名只在朝夕間。

sentences.english: Cherish every second to reach the goal.
sentences.chinese: 達成目標，在於只爭朝夕。

sentences.english: Solving the problem of bribery in India is not going to happen overnight.
sentences.chinese: 在印度，解決行賄問題並非朝夕之功。

sentences.english: Ten thousand years are too long, / Seize the day, seize the hour!
How to make love heart accompany all the time?
sentences.chinese: 如何讓愛的心語朝夕相伴？

sentences.english: Rome was not built in a day!
sentences.chinese: 羅馬城非朝夕建成，偉業非一日之功。

sentences.english: Clear the wind, I photograph of a naked with cloud to but no shadow.
sentences.chinese: 清露朝夕憐芳草，風攜雲去卻無影。

sentences.english: Love-is meets from morning until evening, actually shape with stranger.
sentences.chinese: 愛情是朝夕相見卻形同陌路。

sentences.english: What’s interesting is the part where parents love their kids but don’t love being with them on a daily basis.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是家長愛孩子，但卻不喜歡與他們朝夕相處。

sentences.english: In the elbow, MengFei found is acting talent Chen.
sentences.chinese: 在朝夕相處中，孟菲發現陳超很有演戲天賦。

sentences.english: Reading great poets, I walked day and night in the shadow of excellence.
sentences.chinese: 常讀大詩人的作品，朝朝夕夕走在出類拔萃的影子裏。

sentences.english: Hope you don't forget all of the memories we shared together.
sentences.chinese: 希望你們不要忘記與我們朝夕相處時的情景。

definition: from dawn to dusk/all the time
to stay together/to rely on one another
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
